backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report mapping implemented features to related frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing key frontend files and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining a full OKLCH variable palette and dark mode values.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component implementing the full one‑page site with navigation, hero, services, and UI logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and managing an authenticated or anonymous backend actor via React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity auth, login state, and persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Custom global Tailwind styles defining the teal/emerald theme, typography, and scrolling behavior.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility to merge class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry point setting up providers and rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with dark mode, content paths, extended theme colors, typography, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s metadata, feature list, image requirements, and pending requests for the WordPress Capital one‑page website.
